name: NRG Blaster
description:
Danger zone!

Your home is beeing invaded by a hungry alien spices that is seeking to have you as dinner. This is an emergency situation! The only way you have to flee is to use your old rocket to get out of this planet, but it is out of fuel. In order to escape, you must defend your spaceship form the enemy forces and fuel it by collecting the energy orbs droped by your invaders when killed. You only have two weapons, your  NRG riffle that requires having energy pods arroud to be activated, and your strong spirit and determination. Good luck!

NRG Blaster is a top-down-shooter greatly inspired by Nuclear Throne in which you have to survive waves of enemies, protecting a hot spot  using the energy pod grouping mechanics to power your weapon and deal with hostile invaders. Currently there are 3 difficulty modes, that modify the number of rounds the player has to go through: Easy (5 rounds), Normal (10 rounds), Difficult (15 rounds). Certain enemies only appear on harder difficulties, so it is recomended to try them out in order to have the full experience.

Feel free to leave a comment down bellow, this is my first serious Game Jame and I would love to see some feedback! Also, thank you for playing my game, it means a lot to me!
